scripts.watch-server: cross-env DEV=1 nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec tsx src
scripts.watch-server-proxied: cross-env FRONTEND_PROXY=3005 ADMIN_PROXY=3006 npm run watch-server
scripts.watch-server-full: npm run start --workspace=frontend & npm run start --workspace=admin & cross-env FRONTEND_PROXY=3005 ADMIN_PROXY=3006 npm run watch-server
scripts.build-all: rm -rf dist && npm run build-server && npm run test-with-server && (npm run build-frontend & npm run build-admin) && echo COMPLETED
scripts.build-server: rm -rf dist/src dist/plugins && npm i && tsc && touch package.json && cp -v -r package.json central.json README* LICENSE* hfs.ico plugins dist && find dist -name .DS_Store -o -name storage -exec rm -rf {} + && node afterbuild.js
scripts.server-for-test-dev: cross-env DEV=1 FRONTEND_PROXY=3005 ADMIN_PROXY=3006 nodemon --ignore tests/ --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec tsx src -- --cwd tests/work --config tests
scripts.test-with-server: sh -c 'npm run port-is-free && tsc && rm -rf tests/work tests/tmp && (node dist/src --cwd tests/work --config tests & echo $! > .server_pid) && sleep 2 && node --import tsx --test "$@" tests/test.ts; _exit=$?; if [ -f ./.server_pid ]; then SERVER_PID=$(cat ./.server_pid); kill "$SERVER_PID" 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f ./.server_pid; fi; exit $_exit' --
scripts.test-ui: npx playwright test frontend && npx playwright test serial
scripts.test-with-ui: sh -c 'npm run port-is-free -- 3005 && npm run start-frontend & npm run port-is-free -- 3006 && npm run start-admin & cross-env TEST_WITH_UI=1 npx playwright test --ui'
scripts.dist: STASHED=; if ! git diff-index --quiet HEAD --; then git stash push -m 'dist' && STASHED=1; fi; CI=1 FORCE_COLOR=1 npm run dist-uncommitted || (EXIT_CODE=$?; [ -n "$STASHED" ] && git stash pop; exit $EXIT_CODE); [ -n "$STASHED" ] && git stash pop
scripts.dist-uncommitted: npm audit --omit=dev --audit-level=moderate && npm run build-all && npm run test-ui && npm run dist-bin
scripts.dist-bin: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-win && npm run dist-bin-linux && npm run dist-bin-linux-arm && npm run dist-bin-mac && npm run dist-bin-mac-arm
scripts.dist-modules: cp package*.json central.json dist && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev && cd .. && node prune_modules
scripts.dist-bin-win: cd dist && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node22-win-x64 && npx resedit-cli --in hfs.exe --icon 1,../hfs.ico --out hfs.exe && zip hfs-windows-x64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs.exe -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-mac-arm: cd dist && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node22-macos-arm64 && zip hfs-mac-arm64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-mac: cd dist && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node22-macos-x64 && zip hfs-mac-x64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-linux: cd dist && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node22-linux-x64 && zip hfs-linux-x64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-bin-linux-arm: cd dist && pkg . --public -C gzip -t node22-linux-arm64 ${GITHUB_ACTIONS:+--public-packages "*"} && zip hfs-linux-arm64-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip hfs -r plugins && cd ..
scripts.dist-win: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-win
scripts.dist-mac-arm: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-mac-arm
scripts.dist-mac: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-mac
scripts.dist-linux: npm run dist-modules && npm run dist-bin-linux
scripts.dist-node: npm run dist-modules && cd dist && zip hfs-node-$(jq -r .version ../package.json).zip -r * -x *.zip *.exe hfs-* *.log logs
